context.speaker: Ali
context.en_line: Do you like pizza?

strings.value: Ha, men pitstsani juda yaxshi ko'raman! Men har hafta oxirida pittsa yeyman.

context.speaker: Malika
context.en_line: Yes, I love pizza! I eat pizza every weekend.

strings.value: Men ham pitstsani yaxshi ko'raman. Lekin men burgerlarni juda yaxshi ko'raman.

context.speaker: Ali
context.en_line: I like pizza too. But I love burgers.

strings.value: Men burgerlarni yaxshi ko'rmayman. Mening onam palovni yaxshi ko'radi.

context.speaker: Malika
context.en_line: I don't like burgers. My mother likes plov.

strings.value: Men palovni juda yaxshi ko'raman! Mening otam hafta oxirida palov pishiradi.

context.speaker: Ali
context.en_line: I love plov! My father cooks plov on weekends.

strings.value: Men shokolad va muzqaymoqni juda yaxshi ko'raman.

context.speaker: Malika
context.en_line: I love chocolate and ice cream.

strings.value: Men ham! Siz har ertalab nonushta qilasizmi?

context.speaker: Ali
context.en_line: Me too! Do you have breakfast every morning?

strings.value: Ha, men uyda nonushta qilaman. Men nonushtani juda yaxshi ko'raman.

context.speaker: Malika
context.en_line: Yes, I have breakfast at home. I love breakfast.

context.speaker: Karim
context.en_line: Do you like music?

strings.value: Ha, men musiqani juda yaxshi ko'raman! Men har kuni tinglayman.

context.speaker: Sara
context.en_line: Yes, I love music very much! I listen every day.

strings.value: Men guruhda o'ynayman. Biz har oy konsert beramiz.

context.speaker: Karim
context.en_line: I play in a band. We give a concert every month.

strings.value: Bu ajoyib! Men qo'shiqchi bo'lishni xohlayman.

context.speaker: Sara
context.en_line: That's great! I want to become a singer.

context.speaker: Karim
context.en_line: Does your sister like music?

strings.value: Ha, u musiqani juda yaxshi ko'radi. Unda ko'p albomlar bor.

context.speaker: Sara
context.en_line: Yes, she loves music. She has a lot of albums.

context.speaker: Karim
context.en_line: Do you like movies?

strings.value: Men kinolarni juda yaxshi ko'raman! Lekin men sportni unchalik yaxshi ko'rmayman.

context.speaker: Sara
context.en_line: I love movies! But I don't like sports very much.

context.speaker: Laylo
context.en_line: What do you like?

strings.value: Men sportni yaxshi ko'raman. Men futbol o'ynayman. Siz nimani yaxshi ko'rasiz?

context.speaker: Vali
context.en_line: I like sports. I play football. What do you like?

strings.value: Men musiqani juda yaxshi ko'raman. Siz musiqani yaxshi ko'rasizmi?

context.speaker: Laylo
context.en_line: I love music. Do you like music?

context.speaker: Vali
context.en_line: Yes, I do. I play in a band.

strings.value: Mening opam ham musiqani juda yaxshi ko'radi. U qo'shiqchi bo'lishni xohlaydi.

context.speaker: Laylo
context.en_line: My sister loves music too. She wants to become a singer.

context.speaker: Vali
context.en_line: What food does she like?

strings.value: U shokoladni juda yaxshi ko'radi. Siz shokoladni yaxshi ko'rasizmi?

context.speaker: Laylo
context.en_line: She loves chocolate. Do you like chocolate?

strings.value: Ha! Men pittsa va palovni ham juda yaxshi ko'raman.

context.speaker: Vali
context.en_line: Yes, I do! I love pizza and plov too.

context.speaker: Omar
context.en_line: Do you like your teacher?

strings.value: Ha! U juda mehribon va foydali.

context.speaker: Malika
context.en_line: Yes, I do! She is very kind and helpful.

strings.value: Men ham! Men do'stona odamlarni juda yaxshi ko'raman.

context.speaker: Omar
context.en_line: Me too! I love friendly people.

strings.value: Sizning akangiz o'z o'qituvchisini yaxshi ko'radimi?

context.speaker: Malika
context.en_line: Does your brother like his teacher?

context.speaker: Omar
context.en_line: Yes. His teacher is funny.

context.speaker: Malika
context.en_line: I like smart classmates.

strings.value: Mening opam jim joylarni yaxshi ko'radi.

context.speaker: Omar
context.en_line: My sister likes quiet places.

strings.value: Men ham kutubxonani yaxshi ko'raman. U juda jim.

context.speaker: Malika
context.en_line: I like the library too. It is very quiet.

strings.value: 'Like' dan keyin ot keladi: 'I like pizza', 'I like music'. Bu preference (afzallik) fe'lidir.
Ingliz tilida ayting: Men musiqani yaxshi ko'raman.
Yo'q, men uni juda yaxshi ko'raman.
Yo'q, men uni juda yaxshi ko'raman.
Kuchlilik shkalasi: hate ← don't like ← like ← love. 'Love' eng kuchli ijobiy his.
Ingliz tilida ayting: Men onamni sevaman.
'Hate' = juda yomon ko'rish (kuchli). 'Don't like' = yoqtirmaslik (yumshoq). 'I hate exams' — kuchli his.
Ingliz tilida ayting: Men dushanbani yomon ko'raman.
'Don't' yordamuchi fe'l — inkor qilish uchun kerak. 'I don't like' — to'g'ri. 'I not like' — NOTO'G'RI.
Ingliz tilida ayting: Men bugerni yoqtirmayman.
Ikkalasi ham to'g'ri! 'Have breakfast' = rasmiyroq. 'Eat breakfast' = oddiyroq. 'Have' ko'p ma'noli.
Ingliz tilida ayting: Men nonushtani yaxshi ko'raman.
Ovqat nomlari (breakfast, lunch, dinner) artiklsiz ishlatiladi: 'I have lunch', 'THE' kerak emas.
Breakfast (ertalab) → Lunch (tushlik) → Dinner (kechki ovqat). Kunning uchta asosiy ovqat vaqti.
Ingliz tilida ayting: Men kechki ovqat yeyman.
Siz kechki ovqatni soat nechada qilasiz?
'Listen' dan keyin 'to' majburiy: 'listen TO music'. 'Listen music' — NOTO'G'RI.
Fe'lga '-er' qo'shilsa, ish bajaruvchi bo'ladi: sing → singer, play → player, teach → teacher.
Guruh ichida bo'lish uchun 'in' ishlatiladi: 'in a band', 'in a team'. A'zo bo'lish ma'nosida.
Ingliz tilida ayting: Men guruhda o'ynayman.
Joyga borish uchun 'go to' ishlatiladi: 'go to a concert', 'go to school'. 'Go' + 'to' = yo'nalish.
'Album' unli harf (a) bilan boshlanadi, shuning uchun 'AN album' — to'g'ri. 'A' emas, 'AN' ishlatiladi.
Ingliz tilida ayting: Men albomni tinglayman.
'Movie' = amerikacha, 'film' = inglizcha. Ikkalasi ham to'g'ri. 'Movies' ko'plik — 'I like movies' (kinol-ar).
Ingliz tilida ayting: Men kinolarni yaxshi ko'raman.
'Play' = jamoaviy sport (football, tennis). 'Do' = individual (yoga, karate). 'Go' = -ing (swimming, running).
Ingliz tilida ayting: Men sportni yaxshi ko'raman.
Ko'p narsani bildirish uchun otga '-s' qo'shiladi: game → games, book → books. Bu ko'plik shakl.
Ingliz tilida ayting: Biz o'yin o'ynaymiz.
'Very much' gap OXIRIDA keladi: 'I love it very much'. 'Very' yolg'iz sifat oldida: 'very good'. 'Very much' — fe'ldan keyin.
Savol so'z + 'do/does' + subject + verb. 'What DO you like?' — to'g'ri. 'What you like?' — NOTO'G'RI.
Ingliz tilida so'rang: Siz nimani yaxshi ko'rasiz?
Ali hamma bilan gaplashadi. U qanday?
'Friendly' sifat (adjective)! Ko'pchilik '-ly' ravish bo'lsa ham, 'friendly' sifat: 'a friendly person'. 'Friend' + 'ly' = do'stona.
'Kind' = 1) mehribon (adjective): 'She is kind'. 2) tur/xil (noun): 'What kind of music?'. Kontekst hal qiladi.
'Funny' = kulgili (makes you laugh). 'Fun' = qiziqarli (enjoyable). 'The movie is funny' (kuldiradi). 'The park is fun' (qiziqarli).
U hamma narsani biladi. U qanday?
'Smart' = aqlli (AmE ko'proq). 'Clever' = aqlli (BrE ko'proq). 'Intelligent' = rasmiyroq. Uchala so'z ham bir xil ma'noda.
'Quiet' = jim, tinch (adjective). 'Quite' = ancha (adverb). Yozilishi o'xshash, lekin boshqa so'zlar! 'Be quiet' — jim bo'ling.
Ingliz tilida ayting: Iltimos jim bo'ling.
U har doim yordam beradi. U qanday?
'-ful' qo'shimchasi '...ga boy/to'la' ma'nosini beradi: help → helpful, care → careful, beauty → beautiful.
Ingliz tilida ayting: U juda yordamsevar.
To'g'ri 'Persons' ham mumkin, lekin 'People' ko'proq ishlatiladi.
'Pizza' ikki xil: 'I like pizza' (umumiy, artiklsiz). 'I want a pizza' (bitta dona). Ovqat nomi sifatida artiklsiz.
Ingliz tilida ayting: Men pitstsani yaxshi ko'raman.
'Burger' — sanaladigan ot. Ko'plikda 's' qo'shiladi: burger → burgers. 'I like burgers' = umumiy (ko'plik).
Ingliz tilida ayting: Men burger yeyman.
'Plov' — o'zbek so'zi, ingliz tilida ham ishlatiladi. 'Pilaf' ham deyishadi. Milliy ovqatlar o'z nomida saqlanishi mumkin.
Ingliz tilida ayting: Men palovni yaxshi ko'raman.
Siz palovni kim pishirganda yaxshi ko'rasiz?
'Laghman' — Markaziy Osiyo taomi. Ingliz tilida 'noodle soup' yoki 'laghman' deb aytiladi. Madaniy so'zlar saqlanadi.
Ingliz tilida ayting: U lag'mon yeydi.
'Chocolate' uncountable (umumiy): 'I like chocolate'. 'A chocolate' = bitta konfet. 'Some chocolate' = biroz.
Ingliz tilida ayting: Men shokolad yeysiz.
'Ice' (muz) + 'cream' (qaymoq) = 'ice cream' (muzqaymoq). Bu compound noun — ikki so'z birlashib yangi ma'no beradi.
Ingliz tilida ayting: Men muzqaymoqni juda yaxshi ko'raman.
